definition: upper reaches (of a river)/to go upstream/to add some water/to water (a crop etc)
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Their observations rewrote the history of water on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 它們的觀察重寫了火星上水的歷史。

sentences.english: Our company has contracted the construction of a water-supply line in the area.
sentences.chinese: 我公司承接了這個地區的上水道修建工程。

definition: to skim/lightly touching the water (as the dragonfly in the idiom 蜻蜓點水|蜻蜓点水)/skin-deep
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
to pour liquid/to irrigate (using waterwheel)/to water/to cast (molten metal)/to mold
